documentation.text: @dev Gets role identifier hash from string. Reverts on unknown role.

devdoc.details: Implements supply chain actions and inherits AccessControlWithOwner for state/logic.      Meant to be called via delegatecall from SupplyChainProxy.      Initialization is handled by the inherited _initializeOwner function.

getRoleIdentifier(string).details: Gets role identifier hash from string. Reverts on unknown role.

initialize(address).details: Public initializer called ONLY ONCE by Proxy constructor via delegatecall.      Delegates *entirely* to the inherited _initializeOwner function.

params.deployer: The address to become the initial owner and admin.

devdoc.title: SupplyChainLogic (Redesigned for Robustness)

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).notice: Returns the admin role that controls `role`.

hasRole(bytes32,address).notice: Returns true if `account` has been granted `role`.
